name: Mu Continent
description: Mu Continent brings the ultimate revolutionary mechanism to BSC ecosystem: A sustainable economic model with BTC mining Vaults, Referral Program, Hold and Earn, and Black Hole design that exponentially builds community consensus. Combine these four together with 100% decentralized liquidity pool in USDT on PancakeSwap and you get a power house token pegged to BTC out of the hands of anyone, except the community as a whole.
